message.entry: Unable to communicate with ROS to start node {0}. Clear the node and recreate it.
Invalid response from the ROS network. Clear the node and recreate it.
Invalid node reference returned from the ROS network. Clear the node and recreate it.
An error occurred while requesting information on the ROS node.
ROS network is no longer accessible by the node object. Recreate the node.
Invalid network reference stored by the ROS node. Recreate the node.
